name: Bangladeshi Taka in WooCommerce
author: Asad Iqbal

sections.description:
Priced Host is proudly announcing our first plugin for wordpress users specially eCommerce site owners from Bangladesh. By default WooCommerce didn’t support Bangladeshi currency (BDT); this little plugin adds the functionality to support BDT.

More

  • Vist the blog post to know more

Feedback

  • Thank you for using or trying our first plugin – We are open to your suggestions and feedback.
  • Drop us a line at www.pricedhost.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Bangladeshi Taka (BDT) will be automatically added to WooCommerce > Setting
  4. Press Save changes.
sections.faq: Please contact with us directly if you have any complexity to install or use the plugin.
